Class RpkDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.RpkDAO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRpkDAO

    public class RpkDAO
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRpkDAO
    The class with all the methods for accessing the Rpk table in the database.

    ville
